*Kamodia seen the Maximal base* Kamodia: Mmmmmm! Who can give me a job?! *S=
he yelled out towards the Maximal base* *Somewhere in a snowy area the stas=
is pod opens and a Polar bear steps out* Wrath: *Grunts in a thinking way t=
hen walks on till he find the Maximal base* *He see's Kamodia and quickly c=
onverts to robot mode and arms himself with his 2 huge shoulder cannons and=
 his big sword* *Kamodia spotted him and converted to robot mode armed hers=
elf with her Bazooka* Wrath: Were you heading there? Kamodia: Why, yes, yes=
 I was. Wrath: Oh...because, so was I. *He says keeping an eye on her*
